website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight and inexpensive rocking horse is a fun toy for all settings, and its perfectly placed handles, low seat, and wide design make it a safer option as well.
pros: Great for indoor or outdoor play

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our great grandson who turned a year old on November 1
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our great grandson who turned a year old on November 1. He got it a couple of weeks before his birthday. I was really surprised that the little guy could ride it right away. He absolutely loves it and so do his parents.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Mayer 724

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of The best gift my son ever got. He loves it! But always watch your kiddo. They can fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Sharp seam. Dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the box was smashed up. Annoying bc this was supposed to be a gift. Secondly, after reading the reviews about sharp edges I figured I had better inspect this thing before giving it to my kid. Sure enough there were several spots where the seam was sharp enough to cut soft chubby little fingers. It looks like they try to scrape along the seam in the factory to smooth it out but they did a pretty bad job. Returning. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old and 8 month old both have a blast on this toy. It's great for indoor or outdoor play. It is lightweight so no major boo-boos if it tips over on your child or someone gets their hand or foot rocked on. It's also low to the ground unlike most rocking toys, so there isn't far to fall if someone takes a tumble. My son is a little bigger than average for 8 months, but I am very comfortable with him playing with this toy. It wipes down easily which is also a plus. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paw Paw Queen 77

customer_reviews.title: Best Rocking Horse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew for christmas, and they bought my daughter the pink one. lol. I previously bought one of those cute stuffed rocking horses that makes noise when the ear is presses, but that was not realistic for her age of 18 months. This one however, the kid love. What makes this horse better is the back. The kids can rock on their own without worring about them falling or sliding off. They also have 2 of these at their daycare and all the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: LSUtigers

customer_reviews.title: Bit hit !
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves it! But hit at his bday! Even an 11 year old jumped on it! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: like "nice ride"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my one year old grand daughter. She was scared of it at first, but got friendlier towards it as it sat in her room. She would approach it and pet and hug it, then finally rode it for a few minutes and when she got off she gave it pat, like "nice ride". It's very sturdy and durable and I love it's classic design, no flashing lights and gimmicks. No assembly was another bonus. I think she'll grow to love her blue horse more and more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Actually Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Most rocking horses available online seem to have really large-radius "tracks" on the bottom that make rocking a boring experience of wobbling back and forth two or three degrees. These sorts focus on having a fancy plush covering and appearing cuddly. Not so with this thing. You can see what you're getting. The structure isn't hidden beneath cloth, and the tight radius on the bottom curve means you can really get your rock on. It's easy to clean and hard to break. No flimsy dowels or Styrofoam in this one. Just one solid plastic unibody that can take some punishment. This thing is a daycare-class toy.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what we wanted. Our one year old son LOVES this horse and is constantly climbing on to rock. The high back offers a lot of protection when he gets a little fast with his rocking. I love it...the quality with little tikes is always top notch. And the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Best rocking horse ever!
customer_reviews.text: Original box came destroyed but I'm just putting the rocking horse under the tree without the box so it didn't really matter. The rocking horse came in almost perfect condition, it was just really dirty, I'm assuming (hoping) from shipping. Wiped it down twice and now it's as good as new! Can't wait for my daughter to see it tomorrow morning under the tree!! I had this when I was a child and it is the most amazing rocking horse I ever had. It's super fun and you can go really fast too. Yes, this rocking horse can tip over but you have to be rocking like crazy to get to that point. Overall I recommend, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyAndHusband

customer_reviews.title: Lil one loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well. It should out live me and my kids! 1 year old try to sit on it, but sometimes falls off, he try to get right back on. 3.5 year old, she sit on it and rock it well. 6 year old stand on it and try to jump off and also try to rock it standing on head and tail part 9 year old try to push the 6 year old down from it. So over all, its a damn sturdy toy. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: nijiraj dharmarajan

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my (then) almost 1 yr old son as an xmas present. Sadly, he didn't really know what to do with it other than he'd jerk on it really quickly. After a bit of coaching that he needs to rock slowly and it'll be much more fun, it clicked maybe at about the 14mo or 15mo mark. By 16mo he was playing stuntman and standing on it while holding the handles to rock or dudley-doright by riding backwards. Still likely to climb on it at almost 20 months and will ride it for a few minutes before moving onto the next fun.
customer_reviews.author: jenksdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad the manufacturing quality is worse than a third world ...
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA. Too bad the manufacturing quality is worse than a third world country. It's hard to make the case to keep manufacturing in the US when quality is this poor. Many sharp edges and scrape marks all over to remove the extra material where the two halves meet. I just put a tshirt over the horse head and it functions fine. 4 stars because it still works and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: KennyG

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, fun
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy, fun. My one year old loves this. He can easily get on and off himself, and has so much fun rocking. We do have to keep an eye on him though, because he will push it to a location he wants to access and stand on it to try to climb. But that's not a knock on the toy, my son is just in his climbing phase. Sturdy enough not to tip on him while he's getting on/off or rocking.
customer_reviews.author: dontfeellikeit

customer_reviews.title: A great living/play room addition!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 15 months — almost 16 months. He has a hard time getting on and off without assistance and isn’t tall enough yet to use himself. So, though I had hoped this would provide enjoyment while I’m working from home, he still needs me to rock it and be right there...and he only uses it for a few minutes. However, I was really happy when I saw it. It’s plastic and durable and easy to clean and will last as he gets older. Once he’s a little taller, I’m so sure he will have a lot of fun with this. He had such a big smile on his face the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing piece of junk! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually shocked that Little Tikes would allow this to leave its factory with such sloppy construction and in damaged condition. I don't know if I just happened to get a bad one, one that was returned, or if all of them look this bad. It's two plastic pieces that are melted together, but the seams are completely off alignment and it looks like someone tried to smooth it out with something sharp and damaged it while doing so. I would advise buying this in a store where you can open the box and inspect it before purchasing. Terrible craftsmanship.. so disappointed in Little Tikes.
customer_reviews.author: daniaz

customer_reviews.title: The grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 18 month old grandson at Christmas after his Grandmother saw another toddler enjoying one. Took him a little while to acclimate to it, as it was just a little too big for him at first. But now going on 21 months he can ride it, and ride it he does! We still have to help him on to it, but once he's on it it's go time! Sturdy, but lightweight, easy to wipe down, easy to store in the corner. Overall a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: ... thought my 1 in a half hear old would love this because we had another wood rocking horse
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 1 in a half hear old would love this because we had another wood rocking horse. The wood one was a little too high for him to get on himself and I was worried he would flip it. So I ordered this little tikes one. He does not like it. Its really low to the ground and I like the fact he can sit on it himself and it wont flip. Which was the main reason I bought it. But he prefers a taller one I suppose. Ill give it some time, and maybe he will come around
customer_reviews.author: Desoree Davis

customer_reviews.title: ROCKING FUN
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE SIZE OF THIS PRODUCT. A GOOD CHOICE FOR SMALLER TODDLERS WITH PARENTAL ASSIST AND OLDER TODDLERS CAN EASILY USE IT INDEPENDENTLY. ONLY CONCERN WAS A YOUNGER TODDLER THAT TIPPED OVER AND HIT FACE ON HANDLE. WHILE PRODUCT IS VERY SOLID, THE BASE IS NOT WEIGHTED DOWN AND IF YOUR LITTLE ONE IS NOT STABLE ON THEIR FEET, A BUMP MAY HAPPEN WITH DISMOUNT. JUST REQUIRES AWARENESS AND CAUTION. A GREAT PURCHASE FOR OUR FAMILY.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy  v

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler 1st Rocker! Fantastic price!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid plastic material! It’s easy for my 9 month old to get on & off (he’s the size of a average 12-13month old) it does slide on floor easily I’m thinking of putting some felt or something on bottom to help hold it in place because if he really starts rocking it tends to slide around. It’s sturdy, very lite weight, super easy to clean and great price! Overall we are very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: long lasting rocking horse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rocking horse for my grandson. this is for his 1st birthday. He has other rocking horses, but he is not big enough for them yet. His babysitter has one of these at her house that he plays with, so now he has his own. I am a big fan of Little Tykes products. I bought my kids Little Tykes toys & now doing the same for my grandchildren. They are very durable & easy to clean. I know it will last for years & will be handed down to other children when he outgrows it !
customer_reviews.author: JNG

customer_reviews.title: Great rocking horse!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this rocking horse! We gave it to him for his first birthday and he figured out how to rock by himself very quickly. I love that it has a high back support unlike a lot of the plush rocking horses, which makes it seem a little safer to me. I purchased this plastic horse with the intent on using it outside this summer and to be able wipe it down easily to bring back inside. It's been a great toy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and we'll built for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these (1 pink & 1 blue ) for our twin grandbabies for there 1st birthdays. Perfect size rocking horses for a couple years of fun for them. Other say they still ride on them at 3 so better yet ! Little tikes have been around for years and we trust there products to hold up. Only complaint is that there are a couple spots that are a little rough on the plastic from the molding when it was casts, but just going to shave them down and will be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: AZCowgirl

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product. My son lives
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy for a while after reading some reviews but asked a few friends who bought this recently and heard good things about it. So glad I bought it bcs it's very sturdy and came in great condition. No sharp areas that can harm a baby. They may or may not have scraped the sharp line in the middle or whatever everyone's talking about but nothing about it's appearance bothered me. Very basic, stable rocking horse for my little man. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Panduka S Piyaratne

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gift this Christmas
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our one year old grandson for Christmas. As soon as we opened the box, he crawled over to it and started rocking (with a bit of help). Since we live a bit away from himI can’t actually say he sits on it all the time. But, we get a pictures of the day from mom and dad. Each batch had at least one with the horse.
customer_reviews.author: JosephTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great Rocking Horse
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this rocking horse. It is lightweight and can easily be moved room to room. He utilizes it for a toy to rock on as well as just a seat to sit on. It is one of his favorite things. Downfalls, it is lightweight, so my 2 year old can and does drag it from room to room wherever he wants it. Also, he hasn’t rocked it over, but he can get it rocking far forward and back and eventually, I image he will flip it. Still, a great purchase as far as I’m concerned. We have had it for 1 year and had no issues with wear or it’s structure. It’s held up well with extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H.

customer_reviews.title: easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 21 mo. grandson. He's almost too big for it. If you are considering getting one, buy it when the child is just walking because he can enjoy it longer. Our grandbaby likes it but has another one at his house that is a spring rocking horse and he can get on it and of course, it's a bigger ride than this little horse.
customer_reviews.author: maggie11

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is poor. Ours came looking used. I think it’s due to lots of residual glue all over which I tried to wash off prior to gifting. One of the eyes was kind of smeared. It was too late to return it so I tied a bow around it and gifted it to someone not feeling proud of the gift. Also there are some rough edges.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Saddle Up for Fun
customer_reviews.text: 15 month old approved. Rocks this horse like it should do flips but it doesn't flip or fall. Since it is smooth plastic and when he rocks it like he does it will scoot across the floor, slowly, but still that could be a furniture concern if not supervised. Our grandson loves it and all the family enjoys watching him enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! 3 and 5 year old fight over it all the time !
customer_reviews.text: This was my son’s potty gift. It was the promise gift one he didn’t wear diapers. Great quality! Very sturdy. My 5 year old and my 3 year old both like it. You’ll get many hours of play with this. Both my kids love this toy so much that they fight over it all the time...will probably buy another one 👍
customer_reviews.author: themonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rocking horse for my grandson's first birthday. He is 22 lbs and 29 inches tall and he is able to climb up on it easily. It was very easy to assemble, took only a few minutes. It is very sturdy and well constructed and lightweight. He loves rocking on this and keeps him entertained for long periods of time. I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bell Chute

customer_reviews.title: Love little rules brand
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked little tykes brand. Its the only brand I bought my kids when they were little. So when my grandson was younger of course I bought the same for him. I got this rocking horse for my friend's grandbaby. He loves it. I know that it will outlast him and any siblings he will have in the future.
customer_reviews.author: k keiff

customer_reviews.title: Great horse
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old loves it! Great quality and durability. My three-year-old and five-year-old nieces also love it when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my grandson and one for my nephew. They are both one year old and learning to walk. Both babies absolutely love this toy. It is wide and sturdy so it does not tip over easily when they pull up on it. The one piece construction makes it easy to clean and the high seat back offers plenty of support for wobbly toddlers. Both babies have also used it as a push toy. They stand in front of the horse and hold onto the handles as they walk about. I hadn't expected them to use it this way but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fun, and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This rocking horse is great. Both of my daughters had one when they were younger. Based on how much they had enjoyed this and how sturdy it is, I bought it as a gift for a 1 year old boy. He is a little small for it, but his 2 year old brother loves it! I really like how easy it is to clean and the fact that it does not make any noise, nor does it need any batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment, great kids toy
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old daughter can't get enough of this rocker. This is a must have toy to add to the collection of toys and will give your little one hours of entertainment. It's all plastic so there's nothing on it to break, which is a huge plus. Great quality and this will get plenty of use from our family.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Nice ride for baby.
customer_reviews.text: I finally received this today and was so excited to have my baby ride on it. He loves it! And he looks so cute lol. The only thing I do agree with other reviewers is that the edges are sharp. So be careful. I’m going to use some gorilla tape to smooth down the sharp edges. But overall, it’s a good riding toy for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Purchased NEW, received USED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product expecting it to be NEW! The box I received had obviously been re-taped. Inside, the bottom of the Blue Rocking Horse has dirt & scratches as if someone tried to use or used this for sometime & then returned it. I don’t have time to exchange, as the family is gathering this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Blufyre

customer_reviews.title: coops ride
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our one year old grandson, he loves it, its easy for him to get on and off by himself and since it sits low to the floor he doesn't need any help. Its very easy to wipe off the days dirt and germs we LOVE that!! A GREAT toy for a child just learning to walk and explore!
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Giddy up
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month can fit on this perfectly. Rides it often and has found he can stand on the saddle and perform tricks to scare mommy. But I let him. Because it's entertainment. My 4 yr old is too big for it thankfully but that doesn't really stop her. It came in one piece which is good. Side note, it can tip over when trying to perform a standing trick.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hill

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Omigosh my 19 month old grandson loves this rocking horse. He received it for Christmas and was 16 months old he didn’t have much to do with it. But since he has been 18 months old it’s his go to in the living room and we take it out on the deck. I have to watch because if it is close to nap time it will lull him to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Edington

customer_reviews.title: Seated area should have been more roomy
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my son. He just turned 15 months but I thought he would have been eager to ride it. I m hoping he does intend to use it. I thought the sitting area would have been a little more roomy as I'm not sure how how he ll be able to fit in it comfortably. I'm seeing they said the recommended age is until 3 years hmmm. Not sure about that! The backrest and the seating area is very snug. It should have been much bigger. Other than that I love the colour and this item.
customer_reviews.author: H.F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent an hour smoothing down all the edges. They were very sharp. This should not have been shipped to consumer, very poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: richard d fox

customer_reviews.title: Buy your kid a pony!
customer_reviews.text: A friend got this for my youngest for his first birthday. It was a huge hit. My 3 year old asked for a pony a few days later and we got her the magenta one of these. Who doesn’t give their kids ponies these days? It is super sturdy, Kudos for Little Tykes and their good quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Sturdy Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old LOVES this. It took her a couple days to figure out how to get her leg over it but even riding side-saddle she had a great time. My 4 year old nephew went ham on it and it still didn't flip over, even with him leaning back. It's so light my toddler pushes it wherever she wants to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son terrified of it at first, now his favorite seat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 10 month old son, and he cried and ran away in terror for 3 months after I got it. I kept sneaking it into the living room thinking he would acclimate - nope. I was going to resell it locally, until one day he got brave and sat on it. Then discovered he could rock! Now it’s his fave, and it has never tipped over on him.
customer_reviews.author: Vette

customer_reviews.title: It’s better than an Easy Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 18 month old grandson, he’s not quite sold on it, yet. My 3 year old granddaughter however LOVES it (she has a Pink one). She rocks while watching her YouTube kids channel for hours. It’s therapeutic for her and she can’t get enough of the rocking, whether she’s rocking on her Pink Horse or her brother’s Blue One.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Ellzey

customer_reviews.title: Smelt like rotten eggs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my 9-month-old son and when I received it, it smelt like rotten eggs both the box and the product. Would not order this again. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: vincent luna

customer_reviews.title: My baby loved it but it's poorly made with very sharp seam ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved it but it's poorly made with very sharp seam all along the middle of the horse - scratched my floors and my baby. Returned it and got the Step2 rocking horse instead
customer_reviews.author: castafiore78

customer_reviews.title: Seems fun
customer_reviews.text: Our one year old likes it, it is nice and low to the ground so we aren't afraid of falling or anything. It will be outgrown very quickly because of it, so consider that before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: One year old approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Boy oh boy did my 1 year old nephew love this gift! He was so excited and proud of himself! It was reasonably priced, easily unboxed, got there in time and he loved it! I’m recommending this item to all the other people out there looking for a gift for a 1 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I had one of these 12 years ago for my first child and I am happy to see that they did away with the removable wooden handles. This toy has been fun for my cowboy toddler and is light enough he can move from room to room by himself. Safe in that it is close to the floor so when he does fall I don't have to worry. This has been a good toy for this family!
customer_reviews.author: mernum

customer_reviews.title: Let's Go To Grandma's House !
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Little Tikes products . My grandkids love these rocking horses . Thesee are very subtly well-constructed to avoid tumbling, falls and injuries. Low-to-the-ground for toddlers and loads of fun. Easy to clean, lightweight
customer_reviews.author: MonieMonie54

customer_reviews.title: Cute rocking horse
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for 10 month old grandchild. She must still be a bit too young to use it. The product came fully assembled and in good condition. I will wait a month or two before I try her on it again, as she is a bit afraid of the rocking motion right now. Good item for the price. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Baby occupied
customer_reviews.text: It’s super simple and great fun! I always wanted one of these for myself, but my son needs it now. He doesn’t walk yet, but enjoys the sensation of moving. He can move it himself, or we can make it go faster which he likes. He gets upset it doesn’t go anywhere like his walker, but that’s why I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a 1st birthday gift for my grandson, he has enjoyed it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sprau

customer_reviews.title: Winner!!!
customer_reviews.text: Classic Winner with every kid!! ages 6 months to 4 years.. they love it.. lasts forever.. we had ours for 15 years before giving it to another family to use.. now that i have grand babies i knew i had to get another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: leanna white

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love! We have watched our son grow into this rocking horse and it's been so sweet. We got it last year for his birthday and he pulls it around the house to ride on saying, "yeehaw" he's almost 2 now and I'm sure will enjoy it for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Helps to get excess energy out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece, who just turned 1. She still needs to grow into it a bit, but she absolutely loves it. She is a ball of energy, and this helps her get some energy out, while her mom can relax from chasing her! My daughter also enjoys it when we go over.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmm18

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rocker!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to but this due to the negative comments about sharp edges... but figured worst case scenario I could sand down any rough seams. But that was not necessary... I was pleasantly surprised to find no seam issues. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C.M

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his rocking horse. He can easily move it around the carpet and put it where he wants it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery service by a UPS driver.
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the product but I do have issues with the UPS driver dumping the boxes off behind a retaining wall next to a public street and 300 feet away from my home because they were too lazy to come down the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived with a hole in the corner. Opened the package and there is a huge scrape across the entire top of the rocking horse, like it was dragged around upside down. It was loose inside the box and not wrapped at all. Definitely not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A rocking ride.
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loves this and rides on it every day. She is age 18 months. Hasn’t tipped it over which is a nice surprise. Easy to clean, works on carpet or tile. The foot rest area is perfect as are the placement of the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri

customer_reviews.title: little guy fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11mo son, he enjoys playing on it already. Its made of a hard durable plastic. No assembly required, just comes in a large box. Perfect for little people. There are no safety straps, so make sure if you little person can't hold on that you are close by.
customer_reviews.author: JasonG

customer_reviews.title: Sentimental gift
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the one I had as a kid ! ( which was the sentimental point behind the gift ) Product appears just as well made now as it was back then and arrived on time. Overall, I’m pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made toys.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little big for our 1 yr old Grandson but our son had numerous Little Tikes toys and they held up great were easy to clean as is this rocker. When he is big enough I know he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One pic is not of the item
customer_reviews.text: Well made, smooth seams but one of the pictures show a stop in the base to restrict how far the toy can rock forward and backward. This unit doesn't have any such stops and perhaps an active child could roll it over.
customer_reviews.author: peb

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is I wish the base were heavier as it slides all around on our floor as my daughters playing on it. Still it's a great toy and I love to see her happy playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Fun, lightweight little rocker
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price and my Grandson loves it. Perfect fit for 18 months. Horsey head can hit a child in the mouth if they are not careful but kids learn quickly and thats the point.
customer_reviews.author: PacNorWest

customer_reviews.title: One year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my nephew’s first birthday. He absolutely loved it! He had a big smile on his face when he sat on it and he didn’t want to get off. No installation, no hassle, easy enough to use for a one year old. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: isma jamil

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old twins love this and their 3 year old sister can’t get enough of it too. Best gift for little toddlers who have energy! We bring it inside and outside, in front of the TV too lol. Big bit
customer_reviews.author: Brian McHugh

customer_reviews.title: You absolutely cannot go wrong the price is great the durability is great and children do love it
customer_reviews.text: You absolutely cannot go wrong the price is great the durability is great and children do love it. I got it for my 17 month old great granddaughter and at least once daily she gets on it, she finds the rocking action very soothing especially when she’s getting tired
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. H. Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Still a great toy after 3 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons 1st birthday and now that he is 6 months from being 5 this rocking horse sees a lot of play from all 3 of my kids (2, 4, and 6). Great toy that has held up against a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic. I bought this for my triplet nephews' first birthday, as a gift to share. The cool thing is Little Tykes always lasts forever. They can have this horse for several years before outgrowing it or breaking it, whichever comes first.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: INJURY CAUTION - BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered today. I should have listened to other reviewers who mentioned poor seams and rough edges. After opening the box (thankfully without my grandson seeing it!), I checked it over carefully. I was HORRIFIED to find at least 3 places that would absolutely slice a child's fingers - and you know they will find those spots. I nearly cut my own hand just checking it over. The joining seam is badly finished in several spots, and the bottom seam is uneven - which would be bad on a hardwood floor to be sure. Little Tikes was THE brand thirty years ago. I am very disappointed and am returning.
customer_reviews.author: YLB

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than my grandson. Is only 18 months old and I thought he'd love it but I think he is a little scared of it. Hope that changes. Is very cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CathyT

customer_reviews.title: Fun little horse - easy for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Good little rocking horse. My 1yr old loves it, and it is easy for her to rock. My only complaint is, I think it should've been smooted down better where the seam is (where the 2 pieces of plastic were welded together). It's not sharp, but I expected better from Little Tykes made in USA products
customer_reviews.author: Granny who bakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rocking horse for small kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's 2nd birthday. He loved it! Plus all the kids at his birthday party couldn't wait for there turn to try it out. Good product at a good price. It was delivered in 3 days. No one can go wrong by ordering this fun little rocking horse.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Not a big hit
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes this so-so. It’s quality is fine. It’s sturdy. We can move it from place to place very easily but he’s just not that interested in it.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Girl

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it’s supposed to be and does what it should. No defect nothing. Came all in beast condition even the box wasn’t ripped up which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: My son love to rock on his horse and is a great way for him to burn off some energy before bed. Well made and can take a beating. Love that this product is made in the USA, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: 556Poor

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a used or returned product from Amazon, there are several scratches on the body. But the rocking horse itself is nice, my baby boy loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Jin

customer_reviews.title: Good For 1 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Little Tyke anyway, but our one year old grandson can rock this horse and it’s very low to the ground which means he can get on and off by himself! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges and bad finishing spoiled the floor
customer_reviews.text: Product finishing should be improved. The sharp edges at the bottom made deep scratches on the wooden floor. It's sharp edges are dangerous for kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great first rocking horse!
customer_reviews.text: This, at the time, cost the same amount as the local second hand store. My grandson loves this and he can't make it flip backwards which is a great safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Little Tikes for the win
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Little Tikes! Bought this for my 20 month old granddaughter. She can get easily on and off without assistance or falling, as well as makes it rock on her own. This is her go to toy as soon as she arrives each visit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Rough jagged seam in the middle of the toy which clearly shows that two halves were seamed together which is a big disappointment cuz there's no way to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Liseli C.

customer_reviews.title: Rough plastic
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers said, the plastic edges is sharp, but I think you can smooth it by a little knife. It’s big. My kid is one year old, and he is not into it. I think this fits the bigger toddlers better.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a gem! All 3 of my kids had one now they are grown and my grandbaby got one for Christmas. Its sturdy, easy to clean and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamitha Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's safe and durable. I don't have to worry about my son falling off. Even when he rocks really hard. He's not high of the ground. Plus I watch him on it. He's 18 months and very tall.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Channer

customer_reviews.title: A great horse. It rocks!
customer_reviews.text: It really rocks. 18-month old took a few weeks to warm up to it. It's well made and inexpensive. Belongs in every little one's stable.
customer_reviews.author: OBK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, safe, and colorful indoor/outdoor item for my childcare learning home. I ordered 3. Thank you for your fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Missg818

customer_reviews.title: Well built, good energy buster
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this and this came on time. I think the design is good. well built. If you detest plastic this is not for you. But if Plastic is not issue I feel this is pretty good toy.
customer_reviews.author: rom

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got this when it was a deal of the day. She’s not totally into it right now, but then again she never sits still for long, so that’s no fault of the toy! I had one of these as a kid too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Rock on
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves his rocker! Easy to transport from his house to mine and it is very sturdy! He will be able to ride for a long time and then pass it down!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna  Faust

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my one year old nephew at first he was scare and hesitate to get on it and now he get on it and rocks on it. He likes it.i recommend it, good price, extremely light toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid after reading some reviews about the sharp seams, but when it arrived, I checked and the seams were mostly smooth. There were a few spots in the curves that the seam had rough spots, I smoothed them with an exacto-knife and no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hodgkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this little horse to my great nephew for his 1 year birthday and it was an absolute hit. Tough enough for a little boy, Lots of fun for all!!
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Great and safe rocker!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it! Birthday present for a one years old...took a few additional months for him to learn to use it! But he enjoys it now.
customer_reviews.author: SNL

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Rocking Horse Blue
product_meta.description:
This children's toy rocking horse has been designed in a bright blue color with smoothed corners and edges. Children will learn balance and coordination. This classic Rocking Horse is ideal for toddlers to make imaginary gallops around the house. This is one happy horse that loves to rock, of course! His sturdy construction and unique design will keep your kids in the saddle for hours!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This is one happy horse that loves to rock, of course! His sturdy construction and unique design will keep your kids in the saddle for hours!
feature_bullets: Download the Little Tikes Play Big Skill on any Alexa-enabled Amazon device to go on fun adventures with your Rocking Horse.
One of Little Tikes' classic items is back!
Small size. Maximum weight limit- up to 50 pounds
Perfect for small indoor or outdoor play areas. Age- 12 months - 3 years
Seat is designed to keep kids from falling forward or back
Easy grip handles; Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,900 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
